page.title: 01Barton and District
page.content:
The area is occupied by dairy farms with some small areas of housing. North-South road and rail routes pass through the eastern part of the area where most of the population lives. Other houses are scattered throughout the area which covers most of Barton and parts of Woodplumpton and Catforth.
Most changes have been gradual but two small developments of post war housing to the east of the main road through Barton have brought people to the area. A few other houses have been built or barns converted but few additional houses have been constructed in the last ten years.
There is some employment on the local farms, market gardens, hotels and garden centre but many people travel about five miles to work in Preston.
